name: Cheesy Chicken and Rice Bake
comments: Be liberal with pepper and cheese
ingredients: 1 bag frozen whole veggies from Sam's
fresh ground pepper and shredded cheddar cheese
instructions: Stir together first 6 ingredients in 8x12" dish. Top with chicken and sprinkle with fresh ground pepper. Cover with foil and bake at 375 degrees for 45 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with Cheddar.
